item0.name: Sterak's Gage
item0.description:
50 Attack Damage
400 Health
  • Bloodlust: Dealing damage to or taking damage from a champion grants a stack, restoring (2% max Health | 1.2% max Health for Ranged champions) over 6 seconds. Stacks beyond the first heal for 50% less.
  • Lifeline: Upon taking damage that would reduce your Health below 30%, gain a 100 Shield (increased by (8% max Health | 4.8% max Health for Ranged champions) per stack of Bloodlust) for 4 seconds (60s cooldown).

    Bloodlust stacks up to 5 times; 1 per champion. Healing and bonus shielding reduced to 60% for Ranged users.

item1.name: Trinity Force
item1.description:
25 Attack Damage
35% Attack Speed
200 Health
20 Ability Haste
  • Threefold Strike: Attacks grant 25 Move Speed for 3 seconds. If the target is a champion, increase your base Attack Damage by 6% for 3 seconds, stacking up to 5 times (Max increase 30% AD).
  • Spellblade: After using an Ability, your next Attack is enhanced with an additional (200% base Attack Damage) physical damage On-Hit (1.5s cooldown).

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 10 Attack Speed.

item2.name: Broken Stopwatch
item2.description:
• Shattered Time: Stopwatch is broken, but can still be upgraded.

    After breaking one Stopwatch, the shopkeeper will only sell you Broken Stopwatches.

item3.name: Titanic Hydra
item3.description:
30 Attack Damage
500 Health
  • Colossus: Gain bonus Attack Damage equal to 1% max Health.
  • Cleave: Attacks apply an additional (5 + 1.5% max Health) physical damage On-Hit, creating a shockwave that deals (40 + 3% max Health) physical damage to enemies behind the target.

    Deals 75% for Ranged users. On-Hit damage is also applied to Structures.

item4.name: Ionian Boots of Lucidity
item4.description:
20 Ability Haste
45 Move Speed
  • Gain 12 Summoner Spell Haste.

    ''This item is dedicated in honor of Ionia's victory over Noxus in the Rematch for the Southern Provinces on 10 December, 20 CLE.'

item5.name: Knight's Vow
item5.description:
400 Health
10 Ability Haste
300% Base Health Regen

Active - Pledge: Designate an ally who is Worthy (60s cooldown).
  • Sacrifice: While your Worthy ally is nearby, redirect 15% of damage they take to you and if they have less than 50% Health gain 35% Move Speed when running towards them.

    Champions can only be linked by one Knight's Vow at a time. Damage redirection stops if you have less than 30% Health

item6.name: Stealth Ward
item6.description: Active - Trinket: Place a Stealth Ward on the ground that lasts between 90 - 120 seconds, is Invisible to enemies but grants your team vision of the surrounding area. Stores up to 2 Stealth Wards, generating a new Ward every 240 - 120 seconds.

perk0.name: Press the Attack
perk0.shortDesc: Hitting an enemy champion 3 consecutive times makes them vulnerable, dealing bonus damage and causing them to take more damage from all sources for 6s.
perk0.longDesc: Hitting an enemy champion with 3 consecutive basic attacks deals 40 - 180 bonus <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_AdaptiveDmg'><font color='#48C4B7'>adaptive damage</font></lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> (based on level) and makes them vulnerable, increasing the damage they take by 8 - 12% from all sources for 6s.

item0.name: Trinity Force
item0.description:
25 Attack Damage
35% Attack Speed
200 Health
20 Ability Haste
  • Threefold Strike: Attacks grant 25 Move Speed for 3 seconds. If the target is a champion, increase your base Attack Damage by 6% for 3 seconds, stacking up to 5 times (Max increase 30% AD).
  • Spellblade: After using an Ability, your next Attack is enhanced with an additional (200% base Attack Damage) physical damage On-Hit (1.5s cooldown).

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 10 Attack Speed.

item1.name: Titanic Hydra
item1.description:
30 Attack Damage
500 Health
  • Colossus: Gain bonus Attack Damage equal to 1% max Health.
  • Cleave: Attacks apply an additional (5 + 1.5% max Health) physical damage On-Hit, creating a shockwave that deals (40 + 3% max Health) physical damage to enemies behind the target.

    Deals 75% for Ranged users. On-Hit damage is also applied to Structures.

item3.name: Doran's Blade
item3.description:
8 Attack Damage
80 Health
  • Warmonger: Gain 2.5% Omnivamp.

    Omnivamp is only 33% effective when dealing area of effect damage or damage through pets.

item4.name: Executioner's Calling
item4.description:
15 Attack Damage
  • Rend: Dealing physical damage applies 40% Grievous Wounds to champions for 3 seconds.

    Grievous Wounds reduces the effectiveness of Healing and Regeneration effects on the target.

item5.name: Ionian Boots of Lucidity
item5.description:
20 Ability Haste
45 Move Speed
  • Gain 12 Summoner Spell Haste.

    ''This item is dedicated in honor of Ionia's victory over Noxus in the Rematch for the Southern Provinces on 10 December, 20 CLE.'

item6.name: Oracle Lens
item6.description: Active - Trinket: Scans around you, warning against hidden enemy units, revealing invisible traps and revealing (and temporarily disabling) enemy Stealth Wards for 10 seconds (90 - 60s cooldown).

perk0.name: Conqueror
perk0.shortDesc: Gain stacks of adaptive force when attacking enemy champions. After reaching 12 stacks, heal for a portion of damage you deal to champions.
perk0.longDesc:
Basic attacks or spells that deal damage to an enemy champion grant 2 stacks of Conqueror for 6s, gaining 2-5 Adaptive Force per stack. Stacks up to 12 times. Ranged champions gain only 1 stack per basic attack.

When fully stacked, heal for 9% of the damage you deal to champions (6% for ranged champions).

item0.name: Doran's Blade
item0.description:
8 Attack Damage
80 Health
  • Warmonger: Gain 2.5% Omnivamp.

    Omnivamp is only 33% effective when dealing area of effect damage or damage through pets.

item1.name: Chain Vest
item1.description: 40 Armor

item2.name: Ravenous Hydra
item2.description:
65 Attack Damage
20 Ability Haste
10% Omnivamp
  • Cleave: Attacks and Abilities deal up to (60% Attack Damage) physical damage to other enemies near target hit.

    Deals a minimum of (12% Attack Damage) damage to units at the end of its range, can only hit each target once per Attack or Ability, and doesn't trigger off of periodic damage.

item3.name: Slightly Magical Footwear
item3.description:
25 Move Speed
  • Grants an additional 10 Move Speed. Boots that build from Slightly Magical Footwear retain this bonus Move Speed.

item5.description:
25 Attack Damage
35% Attack Speed
200 Health

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 10 Attack Speed.

item6.name: Stealth Ward
item6.description: Active - Trinket: Place a Stealth Ward on the ground that lasts between 90 - 120 seconds, is Invisible to enemies but grants your team vision of the surrounding area. Stores up to 2 Stealth Wards, generating a new Ward every 240 - 120 seconds.

perk0.name: Grasp of the Undying
perk0.shortDesc: Every 4s your next attack on a champion deals bonus magic damage, heals you, and permanently increases your health.
perk0.longDesc:
Every 4s in combat, your next basic attack on a champion will:
  • Deal bonus magic damage equal to 4% of your max health
  • Heals you for 2% of your max health
  • Permanently increase your health by 5

    • Ranged Champions: Damage, healing, and permanent health gained reduced by 40%.

item0.description:
40 Attack Damage
400 Health
20 Ability Haste
  • Spellblade: After using an Ability, your next Attack is enhanced with an additional 10% target max Health physical damage On-Hit (1.5s cooldown). If the target is a champion, restore 50% of the enhanced damage (30% for Ranged owners).

    Spellblade will deal a minimum of (150% base Attack Damage) damage to units, but no more than (250% base Attack Damage) damage to Monsters.

item0.description:
80 Health
  • Focus: Attacks deal an additional 5 physical damage to minions.
  • Recovery: Restores 6 Health every 5 seconds.
  • Endure: Restores up to 40 Health over 8 seconds after taking damage from a champion, large jungle monster, or epic jungle monster. Restoration increases when you are low Health.

    Endure 66% effective when owned by Ranged champions or when taking damage from area of effect or periodic damage sources.

You may carry up to 2 Control Wards. Control Wards do not disable other Control Wards.

25 Attack Damage
10 Ability Haste

item1.name: Executioner's Calling
item1.description:
15 Attack Damage
  • Rend: Dealing physical damage applies 40% Grievous Wounds to champions for 3 seconds.

    Grievous Wounds reduces the effectiveness of Healing and Regeneration effects on the target.

item2.name: Cloth Armor
item2.description: 15 Armor

item3.name: Trinity Force
item3.description:
25 Attack Damage
35% Attack Speed
200 Health
20 Ability Haste
  • Threefold Strike: Attacks grant 25 Move Speed for 3 seconds. If the target is a champion, increase your base Attack Damage by 6% for 3 seconds, stacking up to 5 times (Max increase 30% AD).
  • Spellblade: After using an Ability, your next Attack is enhanced with an additional (200% base Attack Damage) physical damage On-Hit (1.5s cooldown).

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 10 Attack Speed.

item4.name: Ravenous Hydra
item4.description:
65 Attack Damage
20 Ability Haste
10% Omnivamp
  • Cleave: Attacks and Abilities deal up to (60% Attack Damage) physical damage to other enemies near target hit.

    Deals a minimum of (12% Attack Damage) damage to units at the end of its range, can only hit each target once per Attack or Ability, and doesn't trigger off of periodic damage.

item5.name: Plated Steelcaps
item5.description:
20 Armor
45 Move Speed
  • Reduces incoming damage from Attacks by 12%.

item6.name: Oracle Lens
item6.description: Active - Trinket: Scans around you, warning against hidden enemy units, revealing invisible traps and revealing (and temporarily disabling) enemy Stealth Wards for 10 seconds (90 - 60s cooldown).

perk0.name: Grasp of the Undying
perk0.shortDesc: Every 4s your next attack on a champion deals bonus magic damage, heals you, and permanently increases your health.
perk0.longDesc:
Every 4s in combat, your next basic attack on a champion will:
  • Deal bonus magic damage equal to 4% of your max health
  • Heals you for 2% of your max health
  • Permanently increase your health by 5

    • Ranged Champions: Damage, healing, and permanent health gained reduced by 40%.

item0.name: Ionian Boots of Lucidity
item0.description:
20 Ability Haste
45 Move Speed
  • Gain 12 Summoner Spell Haste.

    ''This item is dedicated in honor of Ionia's victory over Noxus in the Rematch for the Southern Provinces on 10 December, 20 CLE.'

item1.name: Stopwatch
item1.description: Active - Stasis: Use one time only to become Invulnerable and Untargetable for 2.5 seconds, but are prevented from taking any other actions during this time (transforms into a Broken Stopwatch).

item2.name: Doran's Blade
item2.description:
8 Attack Damage
80 Health
  • Warmonger: Gain 2.5% Omnivamp.

    Omnivamp is only 33% effective when dealing area of effect damage or damage through pets.

item3.name: Trinity Force
item3.description:
25 Attack Damage
35% Attack Speed
200 Health
20 Ability Haste
  • Threefold Strike: Attacks grant 25 Move Speed for 3 seconds. If the target is a champion, increase your base Attack Damage by 6% for 3 seconds, stacking up to 5 times (Max increase 30% AD).
  • Spellblade: After using an Ability, your next Attack is enhanced with an additional (200% base Attack Damage) physical damage On-Hit (1.5s cooldown).

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 10 Attack Speed.

item4.name: Titanic Hydra
item4.description:
30 Attack Damage
500 Health
  • Colossus: Gain bonus Attack Damage equal to 1% max Health.
  • Cleave: Attacks apply an additional (5 + 1.5% max Health) physical damage On-Hit, creating a shockwave that deals (40 + 3% max Health) physical damage to enemies behind the target.

    Deals 75% for Ranged users. On-Hit damage is also applied to Structures.

item6.name: Stealth Ward
item6.description: Active - Trinket: Place a Stealth Ward on the ground that lasts between 90 - 120 seconds, is Invisible to enemies but grants your team vision of the surrounding area. Stores up to 2 Stealth Wards, generating a new Ward every 240 - 120 seconds.

perk0.name: Grasp of the Undying
perk0.shortDesc: Every 4s your next attack on a champion deals bonus magic damage, heals you, and permanently increases your health.
perk0.longDesc:
Every 4s in combat, your next basic attack on a champion will:
  • Deal bonus magic damage equal to 4% of your max health
  • Heals you for 2% of your max health
  • Permanently increase your health by 5

    • Ranged Champions: Damage, healing, and permanent health gained reduced by 40%.

item0.description:

  • Reap: Killing a lane minion grants 1 additional gold. Killing 100 lane minions grants an additional 350 bonus gold immediately and disables Reap.

item6.name: Stealth Ward

perk0.name: Conqueror
perk0.shortDesc: Gain stacks of adaptive force when attacking enemy champions. After reaching 12 stacks, heal for a portion of damage you deal to champions.
perk0.longDesc:
Basic attacks or spells that deal damage to an enemy champion grant 2 stacks of Conqueror for 6s, gaining 2-5 Adaptive Force per stack. Stacks up to 12 times. Ranged champions gain only 1 stack per basic attack.

When fully stacked, heal for 9% of the damage you deal to champions (6% for ranged champions).

item0.name: Doran's Shield
item0.description:
80 Health
  • Focus: Attacks deal an additional 5 physical damage to minions.
  • Recovery: Restores 6 Health every 5 seconds.
  • Endure: Restores up to 40 Health over 8 seconds after taking damage from a champion, large jungle monster, or epic jungle monster. Restoration increases when you are low Health.

    Endure 66% effective when owned by Ranged champions or when taking damage from area of effect or periodic damage sources.

item0.name: Sterak's Gage
item0.description:
50 Attack Damage
400 Health
  • Bloodlust: Dealing damage to or taking damage from a champion grants a stack, restoring (2% max Health | 1.2% max Health for Ranged champions) over 6 seconds. Stacks beyond the first heal for 50% less.
  • Lifeline: Upon taking damage that would reduce your Health below 30%, gain a 100 Shield (increased by (8% max Health | 4.8% max Health for Ranged champions) per stack of Bloodlust) for 4 seconds (60s cooldown).

    Bloodlust stacks up to 5 times; 1 per champion. Healing and bonus shielding reduced to 60% for Ranged users.

item1.name: Stopwatch
item1.description: Active - Stasis: Use one time only to become Invulnerable and Untargetable for 2.5 seconds, but are prevented from taking any other actions during this time (transforms into a Broken Stopwatch).

item2.name: Divine Sunderer
item2.description:
40 Attack Damage
400 Health
20 Ability Haste
  • Spellblade: After using an Ability, your next Attack is enhanced with an additional 10% target max Health physical damage On-Hit (1.5s cooldown). If the target is a champion, restore 50% of the enhanced damage (30% for Ranged owners).

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5% Armor Penetration and 5% Magic Penetration.

    Spellblade will deal a minimum of (150% base Attack Damage) damage to units, but no more than (250% base Attack Damage) damage to Monsters.

item3.description:
20 Armor
45 Move Speed
  • Reduces incoming damage from Attacks by 12%.

item6.description: Active - Trinket: Reveals an area and places a visible, fragile Ward up to 4000 units away. Allies cannot target this Ward with Summoner Spells or Abilities (198 - 99s cooldown).
